location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Charles Sealy aboard the HC cruizer Ternateat Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū], to Lieutenant George Herne, commanding the HC cruizer Nautilus

mods.abstract: Captain Charles Sealy instructs Lieutenant George Herne to relieve the Benaresby sailing the Nautilusto the coastal waters off Shaga [Sharjah] and there intercept two boats returning from Zanzibar, known to have committed piratical attacks and murder near Rasulhad [Ḥadd, Ra's al,cape].
